title: PES CSE RR campus vs VIT Vellore CSE CAT 3
content: I will mostly get PES CSE through JEE mains and I've been allotted CSE in CAT 3 for VIT and I was wondering which college is better based on placements and college life.

comments.body: how much did you get in jee mains
Is pes really good plz do tell ..???
